channel.title: CVE Feed for Novell -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Novell -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-9277|2024-08-05T17:02:43.486Z -- novell -- edirectory
item.description: The LDAP backend in Novell eDirectory before 9.0 SP4 when switched to EBA (Enhanced Background Authentication) kept open connections without EBA.

item.title: CVE-2017-9267|2024-08-05T17:02:43.697Z -- novell -- edirectory
item.description: In Novell eDirectory before 9.0.3.1 the LDAP interface was not strictly enforcing cipher restrictions allowing weaker ciphers to be used during SSL BIND operations.
